title: Community Skin Spotlight
body:
From the refined Lady Rek’sai to the utterly terrifying Star Guardian Urgot, we dug up a few of our favorite community-created skin concepts to spotlight! Though we probably won’t be seeing these in-game any time soon, they definitely deserve some love.

Which is your favorite? Let us know in the comments below!
----

#Reverse Nami
"Feet are strange!" 

http://i.imgur.com/o4aeo9Z.gif
_**Concept by [Zeshroom](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=4090758), animation by [Scurb](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l7Vu-paw6Cw&feature=youtu.be)**_ 

#Lady Rek’sai
Ever the elegant lady, our Lady Rek’sai! She really dug herself a hole wearing a white dress as the resident Void Burrower, though.

http://i.imgur.com/07qcxeP.png
_**Art by [CilviaMirell](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/hUENahBF-lady-reksai)**_ 

#Crazy Cat Lady Yorick
I bet being a gravedigger is really lonely work. It’s okay, Yorick, we’re not judging you.

http://i.imgur.com/aaeUwKd.png
_**Concept by [TinyCatFace](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3815890&highlight=yorick+the+craz), art by [slowgun9](http://slowgun9.deviantart.com/art/Yorick-Lg-398552629?ga_submit_new=10%253A1378511478)**_ 

#Star Guardian Urgot
“Paint me like one of your Demacian girls.”

http://i.imgur.com/GuncKhq.gif
_**Animation by [RedRiot](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YWlHdm9coNQ&feature=youtu.be)**_ 

#Used Car Salesman Tahm Kench
Call me mad as a March hare - these are the best automotive deals this here side of the river!

http://i.imgur.com/eEuy7y6.png
_**Art by [DrWafercookies](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/EKzq4AP2-used-car-salesman-tahm) **_ 

#Burgergot
Eternal life... endless refills

http://i.imgur.com/4Vgh2Ou.jpg
_**Art by [Codeine Demon](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/ydXNFz14-burgergot-the-burger-skin-for-urgot)**_ 

#Dog Walker Thresh
"Wretched mongrels get the leash."

http://i.imgur.com/YujTpsU.jpg
_**Concept by [Chronomaiden](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3722206&page=72#post44980575), art by [VegaColors](http://vegacolors.deviantart.com/art/Dog-Walker-Thresh-456171382)**_

#Barn, the Sentient Barn
Of course Barn isn’t a skin, but we couldn’t have a list of fun community-created concepts and not feature him! Best barn, barn none.

http://i.imgur.com/bMnvVQb.jpg
_**Concept by [MyNameIsDonovan](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=2425713), art by [Zeriel00](http://zeriel00.deviantart.com/art/Barn-the-sentient-Barn-514860376)**_

replies.body: Of all of them, I absolutely want to see Crazy Cat Lady Yorick become an actual skin.{{champion:83}}
He's digging his own grave with those cats.
he might actually get played if they make the crazy cat lady skin LMAO
Not gonna lie, I'd probably exclusively play yorick if he had a crazy cat lady skin 0_o
I would so love lady rek'sai! Gentleman cho'gath needs a fancy date to the void ball.

No Little Red Riding Kindred?

https://36.media.tumblr.com/5fe4c1459c075ed7622de5697ebd4cf6/tumblr_nws94lTZdf1rfl2kqo1_1280.png

Seriously, I want this thing.
I haven't seen that one yet! That concept is adorable. :3

Still waiting for Shenpai.

But this is enjoyable.

What about this one? I am assuming it was made by the same person who did that Thresh concept as he is in the background of this Singed one which I would buy in a heartbeat, especially since it appeals to me as a father. :)

http://apollo-na-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1409004287505/10636428_762900017085187_878772402328586751_o.jpg
I love Father's Day Singed! :D And you're right, it's by [VegaColors.](http://vegacolors.deviantart.com/art/Happy-Father-Singed-476719632)
I'm personally a fan of the concept art for a beekeeper singed I saw a long while ago, I believe it became a custom skin, but I'd love to see it official with that Riot touch
I need, not want, NEED Crazy Cat Lady Yorick to exist.
Same, I need this skin. If it existed, I would use it 100% and play Yorick more.

Star Guardian Urgot is beautiful beyond words.
http://d.justpo.st/media/images/2013/10/eb3906dd7c7d641bfdf6a6c0f7ea8ab7.gif

Where's Dia de los Muertekaiser? Damnit!
http://pre09.deviantart.net/4977/th/pre/f/2012/212/2/3/dia_de_los_muertekaiser_by_scodo-d598uyt.jpg

Has no one seen the glorious art for pool party braum? Poro's in floaties, a large red lifeguard float for his shield, in a like guard shirt and most importantly. Braum in a speedo, you would have my money so fast rito.

https://40.media.tumblr.com/fab031441fd8f31751e1d6f82218f035/tumblr_nocyayDm0r1sfvhm7o1_1280.png
http://40.media.tumblr.com/f0bdd3ccc7c8ecd14f9e8d8a9c7940a8/tumblr_o1b6ftKZmS1um3mlbo1_1280.jpg i can't see my buttholebunny urgot i'm disapponted
It's like if Teemo and Urgot had a child.
I'd buy Star Guardian Urgot in a hearbeat! Never have I seen something so enchanting!
top lane battle royal dog walker{{champion:412}}  versus cat lady {{champion:83}}
screw Star Guardian Urgot, someone needs to make Star Guardian Taric {{champion:44}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
1 pink skin per champ sorry
I await the day they make Reverse Udyr. I want to see a bear wearing a human skin!
That, sir, is both epic and terrifying at the same time.
would each stance be a different race?

http://41.media.tumblr.com/b7d46e58c89eacdae176c982dda20ab4/tumblr_nhiweiks2P1rgdio9o1_1280.png
If Burgergot is gonna be a thing, we're gonna need to have Fast food Emperor Azir.

"Fries! For Shurima!"
Can we please get a Car Salesman Illaoi, with wacky wavy inflatable arm man tentacles?
Farmer Nasus And Baker Pantheon
Yorick and thresh the dog walker please make it. also burgergot is just genius {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Burgergot is about to take it into 'Maximum Overdrive'

> [{quoted}](name=kumumps,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AlYEMbEO,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-03-02T18:10:35.339+0000)
>
> Burgergot is about to take it into 'Maximum Overdrive'

Maximun OverDrive-Through
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

"Though we probably wonâ€™t be seeing these in-game any time soon"

http://img15.deviantart.net/1ea3/i/2014/199/3/c/yohgot_by_canned_sardines-d7r714t.png

So this means Yohgot confirmed?

I want that crazy cat lady Yorick to be a thing. He could really use a new skin, even if they don't give it a spotlight like they do for others. They could release in October and make it his Halloween skin.

I saw this suggestion a while ago and I think it merits being brought up again;

Can we get an Anchorman Nautilus{{champion:111}} to go with Forecast Janna{{champion:40}} and Prime Time Draven{{champion:119}}?
Why would you not make cat lady Yorick immediately? Why are we even discussing it? I mean seriously, stop reading this and go make cat lady Yorick a thing RIGHT FREAKING NOW!
What about Star Guardian Garen?{{champion:86}}
i think the dog walker thresh is pretty cool should totally have a combo with warwick
Id love to see a Shep-bard skin :D Think it would be really popular. Bard would have little sheep, possibly other animals, and some overalls with an old straw hat!
WHOOOOP  I'M FEATURED NOICE ~REDRIOT BABAH~

Oh, the mastermind behind that majestic video is here! Never have I been so entranced yet simultaneously horrified by anything like this.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Most of the other marksmen have a mafia skin. So where's the UrgodFather?
One day Cat Lady Yorick...one day.

Never in my life have i seen something as horrifying as star guardian Urgot...
I WANT ONE!
I would like to request a baker Pantheon skin he needs to be freed {{champion:80}}
PLS DOG WALKER THRESH!!!
i want a definitely not kog-maw skin for April fools, where its kog-maw in a puppy costume. just saying..... it would be adorable.
NGL i would buy Lady Rek'Sai instantly :3 Love all of these
Burgergot needs to be a thing. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Star Guardian Urgot...

it is so bad it is good.
